ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Digest Number 211
ygData.msgSnippet: Not sure how many others are on this list any longer, but I ll give you my experience even though it was pre-PoP.  I m a 61 Iksar SK, I was 59 when PoP came
ygData.messageBody:
Not sure how many others are on this list any longer, but I'll give you my experience even though it was pre-PoP.  I'm a 61 Iksar SK, I was 59 when PoP came out so I've been mostly grinding out aa since then.
 
As far as exp is concerned it all depends on if you group or solo and if you have to pickup all the members of your group or have some friends that join you.  Zones that I exp'd in my early 50's were Seb, HS, HHK, and Chardok but with Luclin and PoP that has opened up a large number of other zones that are ripe for your level.
 
I'm not sure if you have visited this MB but I've linked it below for you, it's the best SK board I've found to date.
http://forums.shadowknight.org/
 
-Vizza Mazercard
-----Original Message-----
From: Michael Schaefer [mailto:mbs@...]
Sent: Monday, June 23, 2003 9:51 AM
To: shadowknight@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Digest Number 211

I am 49 TSK now, lacking just 1 yellow to 50

The XP in the Dreadlands is starting to slow a bit, where should I go next? Should I tough it out here for another level?

My goal is to get to Level 51 then pick up a few AA points (regen 3 and run 3), and then take some time off from the XP grind to work on skills


Eric Draven wrote:
Arsenic del' Sangre
65 TSK
Metreus del' Sangre
retired 50th DE SK
I am still loving this class since April of 1999.
400 days + played between my 2 SK's now.
But yah, the list is pretty dead. =)


This IS a dead list

Know any better ones?
